scripts.build:lib: npm run build:ui && npm run build:util
scripts.del:publish: npm run build && cross-env NODE_DEBUG=info node publish.js
scripts.build:ui: npm run build:uicommon && npm run build:uilib
scripts.build:util: npm run build:utilcommon && npm run build:utillib
scripts.build:uicommon: vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name huteming-ui --dest packages/ui/dist --report packages/ui/index.js
scripts.build:uilib: npm run b:1 && npm run b:2 && npm run b:4
scripts.build:utilcommon: vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name huteming-util --dest packages/util/dist --report packages/util/index.js
scripts.b:1: npm run car && npm run cai && npm run clo && npm run fle && npm run fli && npm run inf && npm run inp
scripts.b:2: npm run pia && npm run pid && npm run pir && npm run pic && npm run pii && npm run pop && npm run tab && npm run tap && npm run tac
scripts.b:3: npm run ani && npm run api && npm run cad && npm run req && npm run rol && npm run sto && npm run too && npm run val && npm run wxd
scripts.b:4: npm run btp && npm run dia && npm run anc && npm run toa && npm run mes
scripts.mes: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name message --dest packages/@ui/message/dist packages/@ui/message/index.js
scripts.toa: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name toast --dest packages/@ui/toast/dist packages/@ui/toast/index.js
scripts.anc: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name anchor --dest packages/@ui/anchor/dist packages/@ui/anchor/index.js
scripts.dia: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name dialog --dest packages/@ui/dialog/dist packages/@ui/dialog/index.js
scripts.btp: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name btn-pay --dest packages/@ui/btn-pay/dist packages/@ui/btn-pay/index.js
scripts.car: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name carousel --dest packages/ui/dist-lib/carousel packages/@ui/carousel/index.js
scripts.cai: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name carousel-item --dest packages/ui/dist-lib/carousel-item packages/@ui/carousel-item/index.js
scripts.clo: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name clocker --dest packages/@ui/clocker/dist packages/@ui/clocker/index.js
scripts.fle: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name flex --dest packages/ui/dist-lib/flex packages/@ui/flex/index.js
scripts.fli: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name flex-item --dest packages/ui/dist-lib/flex-item packages/@ui/flex-item/index.js
scripts.inf: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name infinite-scroll --dest packages/@ui/infinite-scroll/dist packages/@ui/infinite-scroll/index.js
scripts.inp: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name input --dest packages/ui/dist-lib/input packages/@ui/input/index.js
scripts.pia: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name picker-address --dest packages/@ui/picker-address/dist packages/@ui/picker-address/index.js
scripts.pid: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name picker-datetime --dest packages/@ui/picker-datetime/dist packages/@ui/picker-datetime/index.js
scripts.pir: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name picker-range --dest packages/ui/dist-lib/picker-range packages/@ui/picker-range/index.js
scripts.pic: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name picker --dest packages/ui/dist-lib/picker packages/@ui/picker/index.js
scripts.pii: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name picker-item --dest packages/ui/dist-lib/picker-item packages/@ui/picker-item/index.js
scripts.pop: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name popup --dest packages/ui/dist-lib/popup packages/@ui/popup/index.js
scripts.tab: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name tab --dest packages/ui/dist-lib/tab packages/@ui/tab/index.js
scripts.tap: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name tab-pane --dest packages/ui/dist-lib/tab-pane packages/@ui/tab-pane/index.js
scripts.tac: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name tab-container --dest packages/ui/dist-lib/tab-container packages/@ui/tab-container/index.js
scripts.ani: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name animation --dest packages/@util/animation/dist packages/@util/animation/index.js
scripts.api: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name api --dest packages/@util/api/dist packages/@util/api/index.js
scripts.cad: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name canvas-draw --dest packages/@util/canvas-draw/dist packages/@util/canvas-draw/index.js
scripts.req: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name request --dest packages/@util/request/dist packages/@util/request/index.js
scripts.rol: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name roller --dest packages/@util/roller/dist packages/@util/roller/index.js
scripts.sto: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name storage --dest packages/@util/storage/dist packages/@util/storage/index.js
scripts.too: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name tool --dest packages/@util/tool/dist packages/@util/tool/index.js
scripts.val: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name validator --dest packages/@util/validator/dist packages/@util/validator/index.js
scripts.wxd: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name wxsdk --dest packages/@util/wxsdk/dist packages/@util/wxsdk/index.js
